A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to love it\, as did most of us but I couldn't get past the huge plot holes throughout\, pointless plotlines used to forward a political agenda\, and Luke's essentially evil character. The only good storyline was Rey/Kylo's. Yoda was an abomination. I can't forgive them for the way they dessecrated these classic characters and I'm only 18. This movie is what happens when your replace good storytelling with propaganda and forced meaning.
